item.title: Labour Force Survey
item.description: This is a work in progress. Each month Statistics Canada releases their Labour Force Survey. This is the main source of information on the latest labour market trends throughout Canada. A selection of some of my graphical analysis, based on the latest data, is available here. Selected statistics for Calgary and Edmonton are here
